title: 1.13/1.14如何生成掉落着的钻石块和如何生成掉落物？？
author: minecraftxixi

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content: 掉落着的钻石块。。。是这个吗？/summon falling_block ~ ~ ~ {BlockState:{Name:diamond_block},Time:1}复制代码生成一个钻石/summon item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond",Count:1}}复制代码

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
minecraftxixi
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-8 13:46
summon item 坐标 {物品nbt}例如
/summon .
我问的就是物品NBT

replies.author: minecraftxixi
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-8 13:46
summon item 坐标 {物品nbt}例如
/summon item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:grass",Count:1b}}
那你知道掉落的钻石块吗
